    • Constructor Detail

      • GeoMovingBehavior

        public GeoMovingBehavior(MovingAgentBody agentBody,
                         Node origin,
                         Node destination,
                         SmartGovContext context,
                         Costs costs)
        GeoMovingBehavior constructor.
        Parameters:
        agentBody - AgentBody of the Agent to which this Behavior will be associated. In practice, this reference is used by MovingBehavior.updateAgentBodyPlan().
        origin - Initial origin
        destination - Initial destination
        context - Current context. Used by MovingBehavior.updateAgentBodyPlan() to compute the new AgentBody's Plan.
        costs - AStar costs used to compute the shortest path between origin and destination

      • GeoMovingBehavior

        public GeoMovingBehavior(MovingAgentBody agentBody,
                         Node origin,
                         Node destination,
                         SmartGovContext context)
        GeoMovingBehavior constructor. The default costs used are DistanceCosts instantiated from the current context nodes. This should be quite safe, because normally this function is called when building agents, and buildAgents is called after buildNodes and buildArcs. However, in special cases, you can manually pass a custom cost using the other constructor.
        Parameters:
        agentBody - AgentBody of the Agent to which this Behavior will be associated. In practice, this reference is used by MovingBehavior.updateAgentBodyPlan().
        origin - Initial origin
        destination - Initial destination
        context - Current context. Used by MovingBehavior.updateAgentBodyPlan() to compute the new AgentBody's Plan.
